author: Good Enough
description:
In 1999, a routine task at a facility in Tokaimura, Japan took a dangerous turn. Three workers handled a substance in a way that triggered an unexpected chain reaction, leading to serious consequences and widespread exposure. This moment changed nuclear safety protocols forever.

#Shorts #Tokaimura #ScienceHistory #TrueStory #CriticalEvent #Japan #RealEvents #EducationalShorts
title: Japan's Power Plant Accident 💥 😰 #didyouknow #mindblown #unsolvedmystery #darkhistory #truestory
